forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady rain, possibly heavy at times in the morning. Winds diminishing late. High 17C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain, possibly heavy at times in the morning. Winds diminishing late. High 62F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.
